DOC.brief_summary: Breast cancer common cancer woman Singapore . Breast cancer survivor usually experience side effects/symptoms surgery and/or adjuvant chemotherapy and/or radiotherapy fatigue , lymphedema , problem sleep , peripheral neuropathy , anxiety/depression . Currently , study include symptom management mindfulness training component breast cancer survivor . And give breast cancer survivor infrequent clinical follow-up , aim develop e-Home base symptom management mindfulness training programme breast cancer survivor determine effect quality life , symptom distress , psychosocial adjustment , psychological morbidity , unplanned outpatient attendance hospitalisation breast cancer survivor . We employ randomised clinical trial four study arm ( 47 subject arm ) together process evaluation ; group 1 ( usual care ) , group 2 ( experimental group : five weekly session online symptom management + mindfulness training programme usual care ) , group 3 ( comparison group 1 : five weekly session online symptom management programme usual care ) , group 4 ( comparison group 2 : five weekly session online mindfulness training programme usual care ) . Subjects complete questionnaire measure 6-item Social Support Questionnaire , Breast Cancer Survivor Self-Efficacy Scale , Quality Life-Cancer Survivor Scale , Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale , Psychosocial Adjustment Illness Scale , short version Fear Recurrence Scale , Hospital anxiety Depression Scale Five Facet Mindfulness Questionnaire baseline ( printed questionnaire ) , 8 week baseline , 12 week baseline 24 week baseline online system print questionnaire . Individualised semi-structured interview ( 15-25 min ) experimental comparison group conduct 24 week baseline understand subject ' experience study programme . Data analyse use SPSS version 24 . Baseline demographic clinical information subject experimental , comparison control group summarise use descriptive statistic , compare use chi square test ANOVA/ANCOVA test . Intention-to-treat approach use . Repeated measure analysis variance use examine difference outcome measure among experimental , comparison control group across study time point . In addition , difference change outcome measure among experimental , comparison group usual care group test use multilevel model technique . A p-value small 5 % consider statistically significant . Content analysis conduct analyse interview data .
DOC.brief_title: Effects e-Home Based Symptom Management Mindfulness Training Programme QoL Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.criteria: woman age 21 able speak read English diagnose breast cancer stage 0 3 first time complete cancer treatment include breast surgery and/or adjuvant chemotherapy and/or radiotherapy 6 month 5 year previously without ongoing HER2 target therapy ( e.g . : Herceptin ) and/or hormonal therapy ECOG Performance Status score 0 1 able understand study give inform consent access internet handheld device illiterate serious psychiatric disorder ( e.g . schizophrenia , dementia , intellectual disability ) ECOG Performance Status score 2
